item.description:
Pathways to Technology Magnet School announces a Fundraiser Dance Party event to help raise money to promote education and build a school in Can Tho, Vietnam.

Join us to help a great cause with LIVE Dance Music with BOXX of ROXX, DJ Dance Music, Cash Bar, Prizes, and food will be available.

CTMatch.com will be helping out by providing a section for all our single friends to meet, mingle, and have a great time.

Everyone is invited to this event on Friday October 22 -7pm at the West Hartford Town Hall, 50 South Main Street, West Hartford, CT 06107 FREE Parking is available in the town hall parking lot.

Discount tickets are available at www.CTMatch.com for $20
or $30 at the event (cash or check only). Contact us to reserve a table for your group.

Have a great time and support a great cause â€“ and party with us at West Hartford Town Hall on Friday OCT 22.


Last year as part of the school's global studies program, a group of students and faculty visited Vietnam. After their visit, they saw a great need to build schools. It is the student's hope to raise enough money to build a school for the children in the town of Can Tho.

Visit http://www.CTMatch.co... or CLICK HERE
Call (860) 236-3343 for more info
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the CTmatch.com section inside

group.name: CTMatch Singles Events Music Dance Speed Dating Golf Comedy

item.name: CTMatch.com and Pathways to Technology Fundraiser Dance Party on FRIDAY OCT 22
